items.content_html: Zehrimar is a next-generation TS/JS playground for productive, lightweight, and modern coding. Features safe and isolated environment, TypeScript/JavaScript first support, powerful IntelliSense, refactoring, debugging, and easy sharing via links. Enjoy quick cached bootup, dark/light themes, offline support, and compatibility with major browsers.
items.title: Zehrimar-App/zehrimar: Zehrimar is a next-generation TS/JS playground for productive, lightweight, and modern coding. Features safe and isolated environment, TypeScript/JavaScript first support, powerful IntelliSense, refactoring, debugging, and easy sharing via links. Enjoy quick cached bootup, dark/light themes, offline support, and compatibility with major browsers.
